name: WrongPlanet.net - cleaner, simpler, more accesible
description:
Cleaner and more accesible version of Wrongplanet.net (Asperger and autism forum)

Will take less space on browsers.
* Underlined links in posts for accesibility, blue unvisited, purple visited :) (2010-12-30)
* Visited topics in purple
* Removed: Huge ad at the left
* Changed: Logo size
* Icons: smaller
* Other small changes
